message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $120 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $165. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, $165 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $140 for the product.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway from $165 to $140, so I can offer it to you for $152.50. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice. However, $152.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $142.50. That's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, Alice. However, $142.50 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $125 for the product.

I've made a big concession, Bob, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $142.50. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free accessory that's worth $20. So, the total value you'll get is $162.50. That's the best I can do.
I appreciate the extra value you're offering, Alice, but I'm still not willing to pay $142.50. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product, and I'll take the free accessory as well.
